text: The Essentials is a compilation album by American musician Jack Johnson. The album features 18 of Johnson's greatest hits over eight of his albums. The album was released only in Japan on July 4, 2018 on CD and for digital download. The album also features Mike D's "Big Sur" remix as the lead single. == Track listing == == Chart performance == The album debuted at number 68 on the Japanese Albums Chart and has remained on the chart for seven weeks. == Charts == {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text- align:center" |- ! Chart (2018) ! title: The Essentials (Jack Johnson album)
